Name: Verify Page Thiet Bi Kts Phu Kien So
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the Thiet Bi Kts Phu Kien So page. Verify the displayed page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://tiki.vn/
step 2: Click on link 'Thi\u1ebft B\u1ecb S\u1ed1 - Ph\u1ee5 Ki\u1ec7n S\u1ed1' -> Navigate to page 'thiet-bi-kts-phu-kien-so/*'
step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Page O To Xe May Xe Dap
Description: Navigate to the home page and access the Do Choi Me Be, Lam Dep Suc Khoe, Dien Gia Dung, and Xe O To Xe May Xe Dap pages. Verify the displayed Xe O To Xe May Xe Dap page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://tiki.vn/
step 2: Click on link '\u0110\u1ed3 Ch\u01a1i - M\u1eb9 & B\xe9' -> Navigate to page 'do-choi-me-be/*'
step 3: Click on link 'kh\u1ecfe \u0111\u1eb9p' -> Navigate to page 'lam-dep-suc-khoe/*'
step 4: Click on link '\u0111i\u1ec7n gia d\u1ee5ng' -> Navigate to page 'dien-gia-dung/*'
step 5: Click on link 'xe c\u1ed9' -> Navigate to page 'o-to-xe-may-xe-dap/*'
step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
